title: Loose Limbs 5: the Anatomy of Fear
description: The fifth installment in the Loose Limbs horror series made famous by its condensed sex and violence.
altHero: a long-haired, wide-eyed man in scrubs holding a cleaver
alt1: a man in surgeon garb holds up a syringe filled with green liquid
alt2: the surgeon pulls back to stick a woman’s foot with the syringe
alt3: the surgeon uses forceps on the woman’s toe
alt4: the woman screams with blood on her face
